author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Use ESGetToken in the SimWatcher classes of SimG4Core/PrintGeomInfo and also update the cfg files for the DDD applications

#### PR validation:

Use cfg's in SimG4Core/PrintGeomInfo/test/python

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-Sim96 Use ESGetToken in the SimWatcher classes of SimG4Core/PrintGeomInfo
